CustomField.formula: CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Status__c, "Active", CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Sub_Status__c, "Treatment Confirmed", "MyRare has confirmed that patient received treatment", "Patient Support", "Hub provided support to patient", "Prescriber Support", "Hub provided support to prescriber", "Transfer to SP IAP", "Hub triaged IAP dispense to SP", "Transfer to SP PAP", "Hub triaged PAP dispense to SP", "Prior Authorization Support Start", "PA support by Hub", "Prior Authorization Approved", "PA was approved by payor", "Prior Authorization Denied", "PA was denied by payor", "Appeal Support (1st Level)", "PA was denied, Hub providing 1st Level support", "Appeal Support (2nd Level)", "PA was denied, Hub providing 2nd Level support", "Appeal Support (3rd Level)", "PA was denied, Hub providing 3rd Level support", "Appeal Support (Peer-to-Peer)", "PA was denied, Peer-to-Peer review", "Appeal Approved", "PA Appeal approved by payor", "Appeal Denied", "PA Appeal denied by payor", "PA/Appeal Support Max Attempts", "PA/Appeal support has exhausted the maximum number of attempts", "Claims Support", "HCP Claims Support", "Copay Support", "Patient Copay Support", null), null)
CustomField.label: Status Description - Active
